text:
circulation, airway and breathing
o insert an intravenous infusion and start rehydration with one litre Sodium Chloride 0,9%.
 Oxytocin 20 units can be added to this drip if needed.
o prescribe antibiotics (see below) and aim to give the first dose before transfer
• At the referral hospital:
o Antibiotic therapy:
 Amoxicillin/clavulanic ac id, IV, 1.2 g, 8 hourly.
• Change to oral treatment after clinical improvement:
o Amoxicillin/clavulanic acid, oral, 875/125 mg 12 hourly for 7–10 days.
